settings.heading: Ingredients
settings.content:
Water, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Pentaerythrityl Stearate/Caprate/Caprylate/Adipate, Niacinamide, Stearyl Alcohol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Glyceryl Stearate, Propanediol, Polyglyceryl-2 Stearate, Polyglyceryl-3 Distearate, Artemisia Vulgaris Extract, Lactobacillus Ferment, Artemisia Capillaris Extract, Stearic Acid, Hydroxyacetophenone, Sorbitan Stearate, Elaeis Guineensis (Palm) Oil, Mentha Arvensis Leaf Oil, Palmitic Acid, Sodium Polyacryloyldimethyl Taurate, Barosma Betulina Leaf Extract, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/VP Copolymer, Hydrogenated Polydecene, Carbomer, Glyceryl Stearate Citrate, Polyglyceryl-3 Methylglucose Distearate, Rosa Damascena Flower Water, Methyl Glucose Sesquistearate, Adenosine, Polysilicone-15, Cetearyl Glucoside, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Extract, Trideceth-10, Melia Azadirachta Leaf Extract, Pentasodium Pentetate, Melia Azadirachta Flower Extract, Tocopherol, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Extract, Glyceryl Oleate, Arachidic Acid, Dipropylene Glycol, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Myristic Acid, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Glycolipids, Oleic Acid, Ocimum Sanctum Leaf Extract, Corallina Officinalis Extract, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Maltodextrin, Ceramide NP, Cholesterol, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Hydrogenated Palm Glycerides Citrate




Note: The above ingredients have been declared in descending order of their concentrations.

settings.heading: How to use
settings.content:
HOW


STEP 1

Apply liberally over the body from the neck down.


STEP 2

Massage in a circular motion until product is completely absorbed.


WHEN

As necessary, whenever your skin needs hydration.


GOOD TO KNOW

Apply when fresh out of the shower or bath so that your open pores can best absorb the nutrients.

settings.text:
1. Intensely hydrate and rejuvinate your skin with this cream-like body lotion; rubbing it on is like putting the icing on the cake!
  2. Treat your skin to luxury; this body cream instantly nourishes and hydrates body skin for a healthy glow.
  3. The whipped-cream texture spreads easily on the skin and is fast-absorbing, leaving skin happy without being greasy.
  4. Suamel, a bioremediator that is used to clean ocean pollution without disturbing native wildlife, plays a key role by hydrating and fortifying skin gently yet effectively.
  5. Hyalucollagen-3, a propietary complex of hyaluronic acid and collagen, attract moisture to the skin all day, ensuring your skin feels plump and healthy from morning to night.

Inspired by eastern holistic practices in self-care, RIMAN aims to improve professional and personal lives across the world by inspiring people to embrace the sacred practice of slowing down and honoring oneself; to view self-care as much more than a chore or routine, but rather an ancient ritual with holistic benefits.
